The figure of six containing these six things : wit, mirth, pleasure, pretty observations, new conceits, and merry jests : When dayes are long, this figure may help you to passe the time away, and it wil breed you much delight to passe away the winters night. D. N.
[24] p.
Printed for John Wright ..., London : 1652.
Prefatory remarks signed: D.N. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
